revised_title: The Consistency of the Isometric Heat Coefficient in Muscle Twitches
tldr: The author investigates the isometric heat coefficient (TI/H) in muscle twitches and its relation to muscle fatigue and lactic acid production. They find that the coefficient remains consistent in well-conditioned muscles, even during moderate levels of fatigue. The author also discusses the breakdown of phosphagen and its connection to lactic acid metabolism in muscle tissue.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Muscle Physiology
